segments.text: In this kitchen drawing, everything seems so ordinary at first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is concentrated on her plate drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the overflowing sink is heartbreaking, water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's unaware, standing in the mess she created.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are risking so much for just cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool wobbling, poor boy might tumble down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so hopeful, but this could end in tears.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies in the jar, a small joy amid the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water damaging the wood, it's all so avoidable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is serene, making the inside feel lonelier.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the mom would notice and keep everyone safe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene tugs at my heart, potential for real sorrow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Daylight highlights the everyday tragedy unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR
